data.title: Latest Free Downloads
data.meta_description: Download Media Players, Audio Encoders, Codec Identifiers, Burning Tools, Subtitle Tools, Video Encoders, Audio Editors, etc - Page 19
data.text:
FastFlix 5.8.1

FastFlix is a free, user-friendly graphical interface designed to make video encoding a breeze, simplifying the process of converting videos to H.264, HEVC, or AV1.
